sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Welcome to ERTG Writer, a proprietary tool created by Styanatos of Envy Games. This tool is specifically designed for creating and editing chapter files for Erainor RPG, a text-based game also made by Envy Games. ERTG Writer streamlines the creation and management of game chapters, providing an efficient and user-friendly interface.
